inclusion.criterion: Gleason Score-GLS: 3+3 and serum Prostate Specific Antigen-PSA: PSA<10 ng/ml
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: intermediate risk prostate cancer defined as clinical stage T2b-c or GLS 7
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: PSA of 10-20 ng/ml, only patients with favourable characteristics: a single factor for intermediate risk AND GLS 3 + 4 AND <50% of biopsy cores containing cancer (12 cores as a minimum)
inclusion.label: met
